name: Zeropoint.IT
overview:
Zeropoint.IT is a managed offshoring organisation. We have been transferring the knowledge and expertise of the best Pakistani and Sri Lankan developers to Europe since 2006. If your organisation has a need for highly qualified software developers but does not have the necessary manpower to develop software, Zeropoint.IT fits best to your needs.

Our main resource centres are located in Islamabad (Pakistan) and Colombo (Sri Lanka), and the European Headquarters are situated in Belgium.

video_embeds.description: Can’t find good software developers? Baffled by their rates or disappointed by the quality of their results? Build your own offshore team with Zeropoint.IT!
